title: fix: correctly pass through pack placement strategies
description: Fixes the incorrect passing of pack placement strategies in the OutlineSegmentCandidatePointSolver and SingleComponentPackSolver classes.

title: Solve misaligned packing with minimum_closest_sum_squared_distance strategy
description: This pull request introduces a new packing strategy called minimum_closest_sum_squared_distance to the OutlineSegmentCandidatePointSolver and SingleComponentPackSolver classes. It adds a new solver, TwoPhaseIrlsSolver, which implements this strategy. The changes include modifications to existing classes to accommodate the new strategy, ensuring that the packing algorithms can utilize this new method for improved packing efficiency.

title: Decoupling Cap Partition
description: Adds functionality to separate decoupling capacitors into their own partitions while partitioning remaining chips based on strong pin connections.

title: Introduce Stage to Identify Decoupling Capacitors
description: Adds a new solver to identify decoupling capacitor groups based on specific criteria, including pin configuration and connections to main chips, along with caching for input problem visualization.
body:

- **init decoupling caps solver**

- **add caching for input problem visualization**

title: Improve Packing Symmetry by switching to minimum_closest_sum_distance pack optimization
description: Changes the packing placement strategy to minimum_closest_sum_squared_distance for improved packing symmetry in circuit layouts.

title: Force Clean Rects for Inner Partition Packing
description: Adds functionality to ensure that the chip body pad fully envelopes the pads for inner partition packing, improving layout accuracy.
